price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߟߌ߫ ߘߡߊߞߊߛߌ ߟߊ߫߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߏ߲߱ ߘߐ߫ ߓߊߏ߬ ߘߊ߲߬ߠߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߡߊ߲߫ ߘߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخُفۡيَةًۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: id'ʿū rabbakum taḍarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
